scripts.clean: mkdirp public && rimraf public/* && mkdirp public/upload
scripts.copy:clean: npm run clean && npm run copy:api && npm run copy:vendor
scripts.dev: npm run copy:clean && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --no-color --watch
scripts.build:dev: npm run copy:clean && npx webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js --no-color
scripts.build:release: npm run copy:clean && npx webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js --no-color && npm run dist:build
scripts.docker:build: cd docker && docker build --rm -f Dockerfile -t clearinghouse/app:latest .
scripts.docker:clean:build: cd docker && docker build --no-cache --rm -f Dockerfile -t clearinghouse/app:latest .
scripts.dist:build: npm run dist:setup && npm run dist:copy && npm run dist:zip && npm run dist:rm
scripts.dist:setup: mkdirp dist && rimraf dist/* && mkdirp dist/conf
scripts.dist:copy: cpr public dist/public && cpr docker dist/docker && cp conf/*.php dist/conf/ && cp docker/*.bash dist/
scripts.dist:zip: cd dist && bestzip bundle.zip public docker conf && cd ..
